00137         // Derived sensors should implement this method to return an
00138         // FCam::Frame, and also implement the non-virtual getFrame()
00139         // method and have it return a platform-specific frame type
00140         // (e.g. an FCam::N900::Frame). In this way, an N900::Sensor
00141         // can return an N900::Frame with getFrame, while casting it
00142         // to a base sensor will result in it returning base frames
00143         // (because getFrame is not virtual, and in the base class
00144         // just calls getBaseFrame)
00145         virtual Frame getBaseFrame() = 0;
